name: Neverwinter Nights: Wyvern Crown of Cormyr
name_original: Neverwinter Nights: Wyvern Crown of Cormyr
description:
Neverwinter Nights: Wyvern Crown of Cormyr is a RPG game. It came out on 01-09-2006. The game is rated as "Skip" on RAWG.
You can play Neverwinter Nights: Wyvern Crown of Cormyr on PC.
Trent Oster produced the game. It was directed by Trent Oster. It was scored by Jeremy Soule.
